- [ ] Complete literature review
- [ ] Define success metrics

- [ ] Plan data strategy
- [ ] Design evaluation framework

## ğŸ› ï¸ Setup Phase

- [ ] Set up documentation system

## ğŸ§ª Experimentation Phase

## ğŸ“ Documentation Phase

## ğŸ” Review Phase

## ğŸ“ˆ Publication Phase

## ğŸš€ Launch Phase
- [ ] Final documentation
- [ ] Release code

- [ ] Present findings
- [ ] Plan future work

## ğŸ”„ Maintenance Phase
- [ ] Monitor performance

- [ ] Plan improvements

## ğŸ“Š Quality Metrics
- [ ] Code quality (>90% coverage)

## ğŸ›¡ï¸ Risk Assessment
- [ ] Technical risks
